name: The King's League
description:
The King’s League is a Top-Down RPG Battle Royale League game made for Ludum Dare 41. 

Controls

WASD / Arrows - Movement
Mouse - Aim
Left Click - Use weapon

1-4 / Mouse Scroll - Change weapon

Future Plans:
  • Traps
  • Potions
  • Smarter Enemies
  • More Variety in graphics & gameplay
  • Music & Sounds!
